data.name: CLArgAggressiveFreeSpaceDescription
data.value: Make free space finding more aggressive.
data.comment: Description for the --a command line argument

data.name: CLArgAggressiveFreeSpaceName
data.value: Aggresive Free Space
data.comment: Name for the --a command line argument

data.name: CLArgAllowSA1Description
data.value: Turn off allowing SA1 enabled features.
data.comment: Description for the --s command line argument

data.name: CLArgAllowSA1Name
data.value: Allow SA1
data.comment: Name for the --s command line argument

data.name: CLArgBankStartDescription
data.value: Do not attempt to save music data in bank 0x40 and above.
data.comment: Description for the --b command line argument

data.name: CLArgBankStartName
data.value: Bank Start
data.comment: Name for the --b command line argument

data.name: CLArgCheckEchoDescription
data.value: Turn off echo buffer checking.
data.comment: Description for the --e command line argument

data.name: CLArgCheckEchoName
data.value: Check Echo
data.comment: Name for the --e command line argument

data.name: CLArgConvertOldAddmusicDescription
data.value: Force off conversion from Addmusic 4.05 and AddmusicM
data.comment: Description for the --c command line argument

data.name: CLArgConvertOldAddmusicName
data.value: Convert
data.comment: Name for the --c command linbe argument

data.name: CLArgCreatePatchDescription
data.value: Create a patch, but do not patch it to the ROM.
data.comment: Description for the --p command line argument

data.name: CLArgCreatePatchName
data.value: Create Patch
data.comment: Name for the --p command line argument

data.name: CLArgDumpSoundEffectsDescription
data.value: Dump sound effects
data.comment: Description for the --dumpsfx/--sfxdump command line argument

data.name: CLArgDumpSoundEffectsName
data.value: Dump Sound Effects
data.comment: Name for the --dumpsfx/--sfxdump command line argument

data.name: CLArgDuplicateCheckingDescription
data.value: Turn off duplicate sample checking.
data.comment: Description for the --d command line argument

data.name: CLArgDuplicateCheckingName
data.value: Duplicate Checking
data.comment: Name for the --d command line argument

data.name: CLArgGenerateSPCDescription
data.value: Only generate SPC files, no ROM required.
data.comment: Description for the --norom command line argument

data.name: CLArgGenerateSPCName
data.value: Generate SPC
data.comment: Name for the --norom command line argument

data.name: CLArgHelpDescription
data.value: Lists and shows help information for the various commands.
data.comment: Description for the --?/--help command line argument

data.name: CLArgHelpName
data.value: Help
data.comment: Name for the --?/--help command line argument

data.name: CLArgHexValidationDescription
data.value: Turn off hex command validation.
data.comment: Description for the --h command line argument

data.name: CLArgHexValidationName
data.value: Hex Validation
data.comment: Name for the --h command line argument

data.name: CLArgOptimizeSampleUsageDescription
data.value: Turn off Optimize Sample Usage.
data.comment: Description for the --u command line argument

data.name: CLArgOptimizeSampleUsageName
data.value: Optimize Sample Usage
data.comment: Name for the --u command line argument

data.name: CLArgRemoveFirstUseDescription
data.value: Removes the first use notification.
data.comment: Description for the --noblock command line argument

data.name: CLArgRemoveFirstUseName
data.value: Remove First Use Notification
data.comment: Name for the --noblock command line argument

data.name: CLArgRomNameDescription
data.value: The Name of the ROM to modify.
data.comment: Description for the --r/--rom command line argument

data.name: CLArgRomNameName
data.value: ROM Name
data.comment: Name for the --r/--rom command line argument

data.name: CLArgStreamDirectDescription
data.value: Description
data.comment: Description for the --srd/--streamredirect command line argument

data.name: CLArgStreamDirectName
data.value: Name
data.comment: Name for the --srd/--streamredirect command line argument

data.name: CLArgVerboseLoggingDescription
data.value: Turn verbosity on. More information will be displayed while using this.
data.comment: Description for the --v/--verbose command line argument

data.name: CLArgVerboseLoggingName
data.value: Verbose Logging
data.comment: Name for the --v/--verbose command line argument

data.name: CLArgVisualizeSPCDescription
data.value: Generates a visualization of the SPC.
data.comment: Description for the --visualize command line argument

data.name: CLArgVisualizeSPCName
data.value: Visualize
data.comment: Name for the --visualize command line argument

data.name: ErrorAlreadyFractionalTempoRatio
data.value: Attempted to use a tempo ratio on a value that was already going to output a fractional value. Song - {0) , Line - {1:D} , Column - {2:D}
data.comment: Notice for when using a tempo ratio for an already fractional value

data.name: ErrorDefaultLengthOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Default Length Command ("l") value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Default Length Command

data.name: ErrorDuplicateLoopNameDefined
data.value: Detected duplicate loop name {0} found in a loop definition. Names can only be used once.
data.comment: Error for when there exists two loops identified with the same name

data.name: ErrorDuplicateRemoteCodeDefinitionNameDefined
data.value: Detected duplicate Remote Code definition name {0} found in a loop definition. Names can only be used once.
data.comment: Error for when there exists two Remote Code Definitions identified with the same name

data.name: ErrorFractionalTempoRatio
data.value: Using the tempo ratio on this value would result in a fractional value. Song - {0) , Line - {1:D} , Column - {2:D}
data.comment: Notice for when a tempo ratio calculation would result in a fractional value

data.name: ErrorGlobalVolumeFadeValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Global Volume Command ("w") fade value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Global Volume Command's fade value

data.name: ErrorGlobalVolumeVolumeValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Global Volume Command ("w") volume value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Global Volume Command's volume value

data.name: ErrorHexCommandSuppliedValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal value ({0}) for Hex Command {1} found. Value must be between {2:D} and {3:D} .
data.comment: Error when a hex value for a hex command is out of range

data.name: ErrorHexCommandValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Hex Command value (${0}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid values for a hex command

data.name: ErrorInstrumentDefinitionHexValueOutOfRange
data.value: Error parsing instrument definition. Hex value found (0x{0}) must be between 0x{1} and 0x{2} .
data.comment: Error for when an instrument definition contains a hex value that is out of range

data.name: ErrorInstrumentDefinitionMissingHexValues
data.value: Error parsing instrument definition; there were too few bytes following the sample (there must be 6).
data.comment: Error for when an instrument definition is missing one or more hex numbers

data.name: ErrorInstrumentValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Instrument Command ("@") instrument number value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Instrument Command

data.name: ErrorIntroDirectiveFoundInLoop
data.value: An Intro Directive (/) cannot be used within a loop.
data.comment: Error when an intro directive is found in a loop

data.name: ErrorMaximumAllowedNumberOfLoopsReached
data.value: Maximum number of named loops and remote code definitions reached.
data.comment: Error for when there exists more than the maximum allowed named loops and remote code definitions within a song

data.name: ErrorNoiseValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Noise Command ("n") value ({0:D}) found. Value must be in hex and between {1:D} and 0x{2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Noise Command

data.name: ErrorPanDirectionOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Pan Command ("y") direction value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Pan Command's direction value

data.name: ErrorQuantizationVolumeValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Quantization Command ("t") volume node.
data.comment: Error for invalid volume node following Quantization node for its volume parameter

data.name: ErrorQuestionMarkValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Question Mark Command ("?") value found. Value must be between 0-2.
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Question Mark Command's value

data.name: ErrorSampleLoadTuningValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Sample Load Command tuning value (${0}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Sample Load Command's tuning value

data.name: ErrorSpcLengthInvalidValue
data.value: Error parsing SPC length field. Format must be m:ss or 'auto'.
data.comment: Error for when the SPC directive's length is not in the correct format

data.name: ErrorSpcLengthValueTooLong
data.value: Songs longer than 16:39 are not allowed by the SPC format.
data.comment: Error for when the SPC directive's length is longer than the supported maximum length of 16:39

data.name: ErrorTempoFadeValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Tempo Command ("t") fade value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Tempo Command's fade value

data.name: ErrorTempoRatioValueOverflow
data.value: Using the tempo ratio on this value would cause it to overflow. Song - {0) , Line - {1:D} , Column - {2:D}
data.comment: Error for when the tempo ratio value overflows the allowed maximum

data.name: ErrorTempoTempoValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Tempo Command ("t") tempo value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Tempo Command's tempo value

data.name: ErrorUndefinedNamedLoopCall
data.value: Loop Call contains a named loop that has not been defined.
data.comment: Error for when a loop is called by a name that hasn't been defined in the song

data.name: ErrorUndefinedRemoteCodeCall
data.value: Remote Code Call contains a remote code definition that has not been defined.
data.comment: Error for when a remote code definition is called by a name that hasn't been defined in the song

data.name: ErrorUnknownHexCommand
data.value: Illegal Hex Command (${0}) found.
data.comment: Error when an unknown hex command is used in the song

data.name: ErrorVibratoDelayOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Vibrato Command ("p") delay value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Vibrato Command's delay value

data.name: ErrorVibratoExtentOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Vibrato Command ("p") extent value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Vibrato Command's extent value

data.name: ErrorVibratoRateOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Vibrato Command ("p") rate value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Vibrato Command's rate value

data.name: ErrorVolumeFadeValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Volume Command ("v") fade value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Volume Command's fade value

data.name: ErrorVolumeVolumeValueOutOfRange
data.value: Illegal Volume Command ("v") volume value ({0:D}) found. Value must be between {1:D} and {2:D} .
data.comment: Error for invalid value for the Volume Command's volume value

data.name: IntroAddmusicVersion
data.comment: Message displaying the current version of the program

data.name: IntroParserVersion
data.comment: Message displaying the current version of the parser

data.name: IntroReadTheReadMe
data.value:
Protip: Be sure to read the readme! If there's an error or something doesn't
seem right, it may have your answer!
data.comment: Message prompting the user to read the readme

data.name: WarningDefaultLengthValidation
data.value: WARNING: A default note length was used that is not divisible by 192 ticks, and thus results in a fractional tick value.
data.comment: Warning for note lengths that yield a fractional tick value

data.name: WarningFactionalTempoRatioValue
data.value: The tempo ratio resulted in a fractional value. Song - {0) , Line - {1:D} , Column - {2:D}
data.comment: Warning for a fractional tempo ratio

data.name: WarningFractionalTickValueFromDots
data.value: WARNING: Adding {0:D} dots to this note results in a fractional tick value. Song - {1) , Line - {2:D} , Column - {3:D}
data.comment: Error for fractional tick amounts when using dots at the end of notes

data.name: WarningLoopIterationOutOfRange
data.value: Invalid loop iteration count. Number of iterations must be between 1-255.
data.comment: Warning for when the number of iterations for a loop is out of the range

data.name: WarningNoteLengthFractionalTickValue
data.value: WARNING: A note length was used that is not divisible by {0:D} ticks, and thus results in a fractional tick value. Song - {1) , Line - {2:D} , Column - {3:D}
data.comment: Warning for when a note length is not divisible by the given amount and will yield a fractional tick value

data.name: WarningOctaveDroppedTooLow
data.value: The octave has been dropped too low.
data.comment: Warning for when the octave is dropped too low during parsing

data.name: WarningOctaveRaisedTooHigh
data.value: The octave has been raised too high.
data.comment: Warning for when the octave is raised too high during parsing

data.name: WarningSpcTextValueTooLong
data.value: "{0}" field was too long. Truncating to "{1}".
data.comment: Warning for when the various SPC directive elements are longer than the supported maximum

data.name: WarningTripletFractionalTickValueFromDots
data.value: WARNING: Adding this note to a triplet results in a fractional tick value. Song - {1) , Line - {2:D} , Column - {3:D}
data.comment: Error for fractional tick amounts when adding this note to a triplet
